scripts.start: npm run config:apply && docker compose up --detach
scripts.test: cd tests && npm install && npm test
scripts.test:module: cd tests && npm install && npm run test:module
scripts.test:spawn: cd tests && npm install && npm run test:spawn
scripts.test:message: cd tests && npm install && npm run test:message
scripts.test:pingpong: cd tests && npm install && npm run test:pingpong
scripts.test:config: cd tests && npm install && npm run test:config
scripts.test:ratelimit: cd tests && npm install && npm run test:ratelimit
